title: Watch Face Mechanic
summary: Watch face for all screen types with support modern smartwatches.
developerAddress:
proizd Voenniy 6

description: Watch face with steps counter, AM/PM and battery level dials. Working fine on all screen types (round/square) newest and oldest models: moto360 1/2gen., TAG Heuer Connected, Sony SW3, LG G W100, LG R W110, LG Urbane W150, Asus Zen Watch and others.Configuration supported languages- English- Français- Deutsch- Українська- Русский- 中文 （繁體）Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.Warning: watch face ONLY FOR ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.
descriptionHTML:
Watch face with steps counter, AM/PM and battery level dials. Working fine on all screen types (round/square) newest and oldest models: moto360 1/2gen., TAG Heuer Connected, Sony SW3, LG G W100, LG R W110, LG Urbane W150, Asus Zen Watch and others.

Configuration supported languages
- English
- Français
- Deutsch
- Українська
- Русский
- 中文 （繁體）

Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
Warning: watch face ONLY FOR ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.
